vfricou.apps.minio role – Install and configure Minio standalone

Note

This role is part of the vfricou.apps collection (version 1.0.0).

It is not included in ansible-core. To check whether it is installed, run ansible-galaxy collection list.

To install it use: ansible-galaxy collection install vfricou.apps.

To use it in a playbook, specify: vfricou.apps.minio.

  • Entry point main – Install and configure Minio standalone

    • Synopsis

    • Parameters

Entry point main – Install and configure Minio standalone

Synopsis

  • Install Minio

  • Configure Minio server as standalone instance

Parameters

Parameter

Comments

minio_admin_password

string / required

Minio admin account password

minio_admin_username

string / required

Minio admin account username

minio_base_path

string

Minio operations base path

Default: "/opt/minio"

minio_bind_address

string

Minio bind address

Default: "0.0.0.0"

minio_bind_port

integer

Minio bind port

Default: 9000

minio_console_bind_address

string

Minio Console bind address

Default: "0.0.0.0"

minio_console_bind_port

integer

Minio Console bind port

Default: 9001

minio_dl_url

string

Specify exact URL where retreive Minio binary file

minio_group

string

System group run minio

Default: "minio"

minio_no_log

boolean

Enable or disable no_log directive

Choices:

  • false

  • true ← (default)

minio_user

string

System user run minio

Default: "minio"

minio_version

string

Minio version

latest specify latest available version in Minio repository

You could install specific minio version with format ERROR while parsing: While parsing “C(YYYY-MM-DDTHH-MM-SSZ” at index 54: Cannot find closing “)” after last parameter

Get version from Minio repository for current version

Get older version from Minio archive repository

Default: "latest"

Examples

# Playbook minio deployment
---
- name: 'Minio'
  hosts:
    - s3
  vars:
    minio_admin_username: '<vaulted_minio_admin_username>'
    minio_admin_password: '<vaulted_minio_admin_password>'
  roles:
    - role: vfricou.apps.minio
      vars:
        minio_admin_username: "{{ __vault_minio_datas.data.data.username }}"
        minio_admin_password: "{{ __vault_minio_datas.data.data.password }}"
